attributes.additional_details:
This petition asks for the re-examination of documented immigrants who entered this country within the last 15 years.

It questions their authorization to stay, questioning whether adequate background checks were conducted, whether their qualifications for labour skills were adequately examined (especially immigrants from countries with notorious bribe and forgeries of educational qualifications) and they entered on valid immigration requirements.

This petition asks for cancellation and removal of such immigrants from Britain who were granted permission to stay due to administrative inadequacies.
